25 template <typename T, typename ELEMENT_INITIALIZER>
26 void initializeElements(std::vector<T>& array, const ELEMENT_INITIALIZER& elementInitializer)
27 {
28  size_t index = 0;
29  for (auto&& element : array)
30  {
31  elementInitializer.initialize(element, index);
32  index++;
33  }
34 }
35 
45 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
46 size_t bitSizeOf(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, const std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
47  size_t bitPosition)
48 {
49  if (ARRAY_TRAITS::IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT)
50  return array.empty() ? 0 : arrayTraits.bitSizeOf(bitPosition, array.at(0)) * array.size();
51 
52  size_t endBitPosition = bitPosition;
53  for (const typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type& element : array)
54  endBitPosition += arrayTraits.bitSizeOf(endBitPosition, element);
55 
56  return endBitPosition - bitPosition;
57 }
58 
68 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
69 size_t bitSizeOfAligned(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, const std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
70  size_t bitPosition)
71 {
72  size_t endBitPosition = bitPosition;
73  const size_t arraySize = array.size();
74  if (ARRAY_TRAITS::IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT && arraySize > 0)
75  {
76  const size_t elementBitSize = arrayTraits.bitSizeOf(bitPosition, array.at(0));
77  endBitPosition = alignTo(NUM_BITS_PER_BYTE, endBitPosition);
78  endBitPosition += (arraySize - 1) * alignTo(NUM_BITS_PER_BYTE, elementBitSize) + elementBitSize;
79  }
80  else
81  {
82  for (const typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type& element : array)
83  {
84  endBitPosition = alignTo(NUM_BITS_PER_BYTE, endBitPosition);
85  endBitPosition += arrayTraits.bitSizeOf(endBitPosition, element);
86  }
87  }
88 
89  return endBitPosition - bitPosition;
90 }
91 
101 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
102 size_t bitSizeOfAuto(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, const std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
103  size_t bitPosition)
104 {
105  const size_t lengthBitSizeOf = zserio::bitSizeOfVarUInt64(array.size());
106 
107  return lengthBitSizeOf + bitSizeOf(arrayTraits, array, bitPosition + lengthBitSizeOf);
108 }
109 
119 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
120 size_t bitSizeOfAlignedAuto(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits,
121  const std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array, size_t bitPosition)
122 {
123  const size_t lengthBitSizeOf = zserio::bitSizeOfVarUInt64(array.size());
124 
125  return lengthBitSizeOf + bitSizeOfAligned(arrayTraits, array, bitPosition + lengthBitSizeOf);
126 }
127 
137 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
138 size_t initializeOffsets(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
139  size_t bitPosition)
140 {
141  if (ARRAY_TRAITS::IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT)
142  {
143  return bitPosition +
144  (array.empty() ? 0 : array.size() * arrayTraits.bitSizeOf(bitPosition, array.at(0)));
145  }
146 
147  size_t endBitPosition = bitPosition;
148  // can't use 'typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type&' because std::vector<bool> returns rvalue
149  for (auto&& element : array)
150  endBitPosition = arrayTraits.initializeOffsets(endBitPosition, element);
151 
152  return endBitPosition;
153 }
154 
165 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS, typename OFFSET_INITIALIZER>
166 size_t initializeOffsetsAligned(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits,
167  std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array, size_t bitPosition,
168  const OFFSET_INITIALIZER& offsetInitializer)
169 {
170  size_t endBitPosition = bitPosition;
171  size_t index = 0;
172  // can't use 'typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type&' because std::vector<bool> returns rvalue
173  for (auto&& element : array)
174  {
175  endBitPosition = alignTo(NUM_BITS_PER_BYTE, endBitPosition);
176  offsetInitializer.initializeOffset(index, bitsToBytes(endBitPosition));
177  endBitPosition = arrayTraits.initializeOffsets(endBitPosition, element);
178  index++;
179  }
180 
181  return endBitPosition;
182 }
183 
193 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
194 size_t initializeOffsetsAuto(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
195  size_t bitPosition)
196 {
197  return initializeOffsets(arrayTraits, array, bitPosition + zserio::bitSizeOfVarUInt64(array.size()));
198 }
199 
210 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS, typename OFFSET_INITIALIZER>
211 size_t initializeOffsetsAlignedAuto(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits,
212  std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array, size_t bitPosition,
213  const OFFSET_INITIALIZER& offsetInitializer)
214 {
215  return initializeOffsetsAligned(arrayTraits, array, bitPosition + zserio::bitSizeOfVarUInt64(array.size()),
216  offsetInitializer);
217 }
218 
227 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
228 void read(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array, BitStreamReader& in,
229  size_t size)
230 {
231  array.clear();
232  array.reserve(size);
233  for (size_t index = 0; index < size; ++index)
234  arrayTraits.read(array, in, index);
235 }
236 
246 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS, typename OFFSET_CHECKER>
247 void readAligned(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
248  BitStreamReader& in, size_t size, const OFFSET_CHECKER& offsetChecker)
249 {
250  array.clear();
251  array.reserve(size);
252  for (size_t index = 0; index < size; ++index)
253  {
254  in.alignTo(NUM_BITS_PER_BYTE);
255  offsetChecker.checkOffset(index, bitsToBytes(in.getBitPosition()));
256  arrayTraits.read(array, in, index);
257  }
258 }
259 
267 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
268 void readAuto(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
269  BitStreamReader& in)
270 {
271  const uint64_t arraySize = in.readVarUInt64();
272  read<ARRAY_TRAITS>(arrayTraits, array, in, convertVarUInt64ToArraySize(arraySize));
273 }
274 
283 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS, typename OFFSET_CHECKER>
284 void readAlignedAuto(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
285  BitStreamReader& in, const OFFSET_CHECKER& offsetChecker)
286 {
287  const uint64_t arraySize = in.readVarUInt64();
288  readAligned(arrayTraits, array, in, convertVarUInt64ToArraySize(arraySize), offsetChecker);
289 }
290 
298 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
299 void readImplicit(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
300  BitStreamReader& in)
301 {
302  array.clear();
303  BitStreamReader::BitPosType bitPosition;
304  // we must read until end of the stream because we don't know element sizes
305  while (true)
306  {
307  bitPosition = in.getBitPosition();
308  const size_t index = array.size();
309  try
310  {
311  arrayTraits.read(array, in, index);
312  }
313  catch (BitStreamException&)
314  {
315  // set correct end bit position in the stream avoiding padding at the end
316  in.setBitPosition(bitPosition);
317  break;
318  }
319  }
320 }
321 
329 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
330 void write(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
331  BitStreamWriter& out)
332 {
333  // can't use 'typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type&' because std::vector<bool> returns rvalue
334  for (auto&& element : array)
335  arrayTraits.write(out, element);
336 }
337 
346 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS, typename OFFSET_CHECKER>
347 void writeAligned(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
348  BitStreamWriter& out, const OFFSET_CHECKER& offsetChecker)
349 {
350  size_t index = 0;
351  // can't use 'typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type&' because std::vector<bool> returns rvalue
352  for (auto&& element : array)
353  {
354  out.alignTo(NUM_BITS_PER_BYTE);
355  offsetChecker.checkOffset(index, bitsToBytes(out.getBitPosition()));
356  arrayTraits.write(out, element);
357  index++;
358  }
359 }
360 
368 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
369 void writeAuto(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
370  BitStreamWriter& out)
371 {
372  out.writeVarUInt64(static_cast<uint64_t>(array.size()));
373  write(arrayTraits, array, out);
374 }
375 
384 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS, typename OFFSET_CHECKER>
385 void writeAlignedAuto(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
386  BitStreamWriter& out, const OFFSET_CHECKER& offsetChecker)
387 {
388  out.writeVarUInt64(static_cast<uint64_t>(array.size()));
389  writeAligned(arrayTraits, array, out, offsetChecker);
390 }

502 template <typename T>
503 class BitFieldArrayTraits
504 {
505 public:
507  typedef T type;
508 
514  explicit BitFieldArrayTraits(uint8_t numBits) : m_numBits(numBits)
515  {
516  }
517 
523  size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, type) const
524  {
525  return m_numBits;
526  }
527 
535  size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, type) const
536  {
537  return bitPosition + m_numBits;
538  }
539 
546  void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t) const
547  {
548  array.push_back(detail::read_bits<type>(in, m_numBits));
549  }
550 
557  void write(BitStreamWriter& out, type value) const
558  {
559  detail::write_bits(out, value, m_numBits);
560  }
561 
563  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = true;
564 
565 private:
566  uint8_t m_numBits;
567 };
568 
572 template <typename T>
573 struct StdIntArrayTraits
574 {
576  typedef T type;
577 
583  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, type)
584  {
585  return NUM_BITS;
586  }
587 
595  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, type)
596  {
597  return bitPosition + NUM_BITS;
598  }
599 
606  static void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t)
607  {
608  array.push_back(detail::read_bits<type>(in, NUM_BITS));
609  }
610 
617  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, type value)
618  {
619  detail::write_bits(out, value, NUM_BITS);
620  }
621 
623  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = true;
624 
625 private:
626  static const uint8_t NUM_BITS = sizeof(type) * 8;
627 };

1253 
1262  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, type value)
1263  {
1264  return bitPosition + bitSizeOf(bitPosition, value);
1265  }
1266 
1273  static void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t)
1274  {
1275  array.push_back(in.readFloat64());
1276  }
1277 
1284  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, type value)
1285  {
1286  out.writeFloat64(value);
1287  }
1288 
1290  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = true;
1291 };
1292 
1296 struct BoolArrayTraits
1297 {
1299  typedef bool type;
1300 
1306  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, type)
1307  {
1308  return 1;
1309  }
1310 
1319  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, type value)
1320  {
1321  return bitPosition + bitSizeOf(bitPosition, value);
1322  }
1323 
1330  static void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t)
1331  {
1332  array.push_back(in.readBool());
1333  }
1334 
1341  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, type value)
1342  {
1343  out.writeBool(value);
1344  }
1345 
1347  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = true;
1348 };
1349 
1353 struct StringArrayTraits
1354 {
1356  typedef std::string type;
1357 
1365  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, const type& value)
1366  {
1367  return zserio::bitSizeOfString(value);
1368  }
1369 
1378  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, const type& value)
1379  {
1380  return bitPosition + bitSizeOf(bitPosition, value);
1381  }
1382 
1389  static void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t)
1390  {
1391  array.push_back(in.readString());
1392  }
1393 
1400  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, type value)
1401  {
1402  out.writeString(value);
1403  }
1404 
1406  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = false;
1407 };
1408 
1412 struct BitBufferArrayTraits
1413 {
1415  typedef zserio::BitBuffer type;
1416 
1424  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, const type& value)
1425  {
1426  return zserio::bitSizeOfBitBuffer(value);
1427  }
1428 
1437  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, const type& value)
1438  {
1439  return bitPosition + bitSizeOf(bitPosition, value);
1440  }
1441 
1448  static void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t)
1449  {
1450  array.push_back(in.readBitBuffer());
1451  }
1452 
1459  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, type value)
1460  {
1461  out.writeBitBuffer(value);
1462  }
1463 
1465  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = false;
1466 };
1467 
1471 template <typename T>
1472 struct EnumArrayTraits
1473 {
1475  typedef T type;
1476 
1484  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, type value)
1485  {
1486  return zserio::bitSizeOf(value);
1487  }
1488 
1497  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, type value)
1498  {
1499  return zserio::initializeOffsets(bitPosition, value);
1500  }
1501 
1508  static void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t)
1509  {
1510  array.push_back(zserio::read<type>(in));
1511  }
1512 
1519  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, type value)
1520  {
1521  zserio::write(out, value);
1522  }
1523 
1524  // Be aware that T can be varuint, so bitSizeOf cannot return constant value.
1526  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = false;
1527 };
1528 
1532 template <typename T, typename ELEMENT_FACTORY = void>
1533 class ObjectArrayTraits
1534 {
1535 public:
1541  explicit ObjectArrayTraits(const ELEMENT_FACTORY& elementFactory) : m_elementFactory(elementFactory)
1542  {
1543  }
1544 
1546  typedef T type;
1547 
1555  void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t index) const
1556  {
1557  m_elementFactory.create(array, in, index);
1558  }
1559 
1560 private:
1561  const ELEMENT_FACTORY& m_elementFactory;
1562 };
1563 
1567 template <typename T>
1568 class ObjectArrayTraits<T>
1569 {
1570 public:
1572  typedef T type;
1573 
1582  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t bitPosition, const type& value)
1583  {
1584  return value.bitSizeOf(bitPosition);
1585  }
1586 
1595  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, type& value)
1596  {
1597  return value.initializeOffsets(bitPosition);
1598  }
1599 
1606  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, type& value)
1607  {
1608  value.write(out, NO_PRE_WRITE_ACTION);
1609  }
1610 
1612  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = false;
1613 };
1614 
1615 } // namespace zserio
